title: Who are the most copied rock bands? - Quora

response.answer_text: Top20: Little Richard(not a band) Chuck Berry(not a band) The Beatles The Rolling Stones Dick Dale and the Deltones Led Zeppelin Black Sabbath Lynyrd Skynard David Bowie(not a band) The Ramones The Sex Pistols Iron Maiden Van Halen Metallica Slayer The Pixies Alice In Chains Mudhoney Soundgarden Green Day

Chuck Berry and Led Zeppelin. Chuck was the greatest influence on the Beatles and the Stones who influenced just about everybody who came after them. Led Zeppelin just about defined hard rock - high pitching singer, loud amps, a guitar hero…the whole works of hard rock and metal. Of course, there are many other very influential people but, the way I ser It, these two were fundamental in the most important trends in rock music - hard rock and blues-based rock and roll.
